mapper.sql: id, username, product_name, min_amt, max_amt, rate, use_date, create_time, creator_id, modified_time, modifier_id, record_state
mapper.insert: insert into product (id, username, product_name, min_amt, max_amt, rate, use_date, create_time, creator_id, modified_time, modifier_id, record_state) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{useDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into product
id, username, product_name, min_amt, max_amt, rate, use_date, create_time, creator_id, modified_time, modifier_id, record_state,
newUUID(), #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{useDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update product set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_amt = #{minAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, max_amt = #{maxAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_state = #{recordState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product where username=#{username} and record_state='0' ORDER BY id
